protein.specific_function: Calcium-binding protein that modulates excitation- contraction coupling in the heart. Contributes to calcium homeostasis in the heart sarcoplasmic reticulum. Modulates the activity of RYR2 calcium channels

reference.reference_text: Wang SL, Tam MF, Ho YS, Pai SH, Kao MC: Isolation and molecular cloning of human sorcin a calcium-binding protein in vincristine-resistant HOB1 lymphoma cells. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1995 Feb 21;1260(3):285-93.
Lee WP: Purification, cDNA cloning, and expression of human sorcin in vincristine-resistant HOB1 lymphoma cell lines. Arch Biochem Biophys. 1996 Jan 15;325(2):217-26.
